io.github.olivierlemasle.ca

Class CA

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.olivierlemasle.ca.CA

  • public final class CA
extends Object
    Root of the Certification Authority DSL.

    All methods in this class are static. They should be statically imported:

    import static io.github.olivierlemasle.ca.CA.*;

    • Method Summary
